name: Codename: Kids Next Door - Operation: V.I.D.E.O.G.A.M.E.
name_original: Codename: Kids Next Door - Operation: V.I.D.E.O.G.A.M.E.
description: Play as your favorite Kids Next Door operative on 14 diverse levels, each with a different style, in this action-packed game. Engage in intense battles with Stickybeard, Knightbrace, The Toiletnator and other notorious and nasty villains from the show.
